sboxHowToPlay:
Rich Girl Game Rules

Classic slots fun with 2x wilds that double the line wins!
Retrigger the bonus again and again to set a new Diamond Run record!

How to Bet

Rich Girl features 9 paylines. Choose to play any number of lines.

BET CONFIGURATION MENU

Press {menu} to open the bet configuration menu.

LINE BET

Displays the current bet per line shown in currency.

Press {left} to decrease the bet per line.

Press {right} to increase the bet per line.

LINES

Displays the current number of paylines selected.

Press {left} to decrease the number of paylines played.

Press {right} to increase the number of paylines played.

CONFIRM

Press {tick} to confirm and close the bet configuration menu.

SPIN

Press {spin} to spin the reels and submit the bet.

Free Spins Bonus

Three Bonus symbols in any position on the centre three reels trigger the Free Spins Bonus.

Triggering the Free Spins Bonus awards three initial free spins. The reels in the Free Spins Bonus have fewer symbols for more frequent wins.

During the Free Spins Bonus, the bonus can be retriggered by getting one or more Diamond Run symbols anywhere on the reels. Retriggering the Free Spins Bonus awards one additional free spin. Be prepared for a lot of extra spins as this game retriggers often. The bonus can be retriggered up to a maximum of 100 free spins per bonus.

The bet in the bonus is the same as the reel spin that triggered the bonus.

Diamond Run Feature

In the Free Spins Bonus, the Current Run and Record Run meters keep track of the number of free spins. The Current Run meter displays the number of times the reels have spun so far in the current bonus. The Record Run meter displays the longest run achieved by the player across all play sessions. The maximum achievable run is 100 free spins.

Rules

Misuse or malfunction voids all pays and plays.

All line win symbols must appear on a played line and on consecutive reels, beginning with the far left reel.

Only highest winner paid on each payline. Line wins are multiplied by the line bet on the winning line.

If one or more Rich Girl logo symbols substitute in a base game win, the pay for that win is doubled.

If one or more Diamond Run symbols substitute in a free spin win, the pay for that win is doubled.

Scatter wins are multiplied by the total bet.

Coinciding wins on different paylines are added. Scatter wins are independent from payline wins and are also added to the total amount paid.

Wins are shown in currency.

Bonus symbols appear in columns 2, 3, and 4 only in the base game.

Regardless of the bet size, there is an award cap on any single transaction. See the paytable for details. A transaction includes the results of the Free Spins Bonus plus the outcome which launched the bonus. If the award cap is reached in the bonus, the bonus ends immediately irrespective of any remaining free spins.

All trademarks are registered trademarks or pending trademarks of IGT in the U.S. and/or other countries. © 2014 IGT. All rights reserved.

Last updated 09 October 2013
sboxPaytable:
Rich Girl Paytable

Payline Wins

{w01} is wild and substitutes for:

{s01}{s02}{s03}{s04}{s05}{s06}{s07}{s08}{s09}

If one or more {w01} substitute in a win, the pay for that win is doubled!

5 4 3 2
{w01} 10,000x 500x 50x 5x
{s01} 500x 100x 10x
{s02} 500x 100x 10x
{s03} 200x 50x 10x
{s04} 200x 50x 10x
{s05} 100x 25x 5x
{s06} 100x 25x 5x
{s07} 100x 25x 5x
{s08} 100x 25x 5x 2x
{s09} 100x 25x 5x 2x

All line wins pay left to right. All line wins multiplied by line bet.

Scatter Wins

Any 5 {s10} pay 25 times total bet.
Any 4 pay 10 times total bet.
Any 3 pay 2 times total bet.
Only highest scatter win paid.

Free Spins Bonus

3 {b01} in any position trigger 3 free spins.

{b01} appears only on reels 2, 3 and 4.

One or more {w02} trigger one additional free spin.

The Free Spins Bonus ends when 0 free spins remain or after 100 free spins have been played.

Free Spins Wins

{w02} is wild and substitutes for {s11}{s12}{s13}{s14}

If one or more {w02} substitute in a win, the pay for that win is doubled!

5 4 3 2
{w02} 1000x 250x 50x
{s11} 50x 20x 5x 2x
{s12} 50x 20x 5x 2x
{s13} 50x 20x 5x 2x
{s14} 50x 20x 5x 2x

Payback Information

In accordance with fair gaming practices required in most legal jurisdictions worldwide, each and every game outcome is completely independent. The odds of getting any particular outcome are always the same.

The odds do not vary based on prior outcomes, bet size, balance size, time of day, day of week, etc. For example, if the top award is won on a play, the chances of winning the top award on the next play are exactly the same. Likewise, prior losses do not change future odds.

The expected payback reflects the theoretical return across a very large number of plays by numerous players over an extended period of time.

{RTP} The results for any given player over a play session can vary widely from this long-term, expected average in either direction. The fewer the number of games played, the wider the normal variance of actual payback may be experienced.

The expected payback value is also based upon correct player choices for any games which involve main game and/or bonus game play strategy.

The maximum win on any transaction including the results of the Free Spins Bonus plus the outcome which launched the bonus is capped at {awardCap}.
